text:
「たまには遠回りも悪くないですね」
そうか、と柔らかく笑った後、歩きながらシンが伸びをした。 その様はどことなく猫のようで、レーナは微笑ましく思う。
休みのものは寝ているせいか、宿舎は静まり返っていた。 なんとなしの雰囲気に圧されて小声で話しかけると、シンがくすりと笑うから、レーナは口を尖らせる。
コツコツとレーナの足音だけが薄暗い廊下に反響した。 レーナの階とは随分趣きが異なる。 シンとしては、寝る場所があれば充分、とのことだが。
trans:
“Taking the long way around isn’t so bad once in a while,”
“Is that so?” Shin replied with a gentle smile before stretching as they walked. The movement had an oddly cat-like quality, and Lena found herself smiling at the sight
The dormitory was completely silent, likely because those who had the day off were napping. Pressured by the stillness of the atmosphere, Lena spoke in a quiet voice, but when Shin chuckled softly in response, she pursed her lips in mild annoyance.
The steady click of Lena’s footsteps echoed down the dim hallway. The atmosphere here felt distinctly different from the floor Lena resided on. Shin had always said that as long as he had a place to sleep, that was enough.
